`$=customJS.dv_funcs.mentionedIn(dv)`

Counterpart to the [[Sympathetic Nervous System]] in the [[ANS]]. Heavily involves the [[Vagus Nerve]]. 

**See**:: [[Neuroscience]]
*`$=customJS.dv_funcs.outlinedIn(dv, this)`*
